TopicTitle: I just landed on unintended vacation due being suspected of COVID-19

Articles.Content:
Polish Ministry of health send me to mandatory 10 day stay at home quarantine  

 

But at least i could watch The Right Stuff

Moved to the Lounge.

Good luck.

Given you are some fraction of my age, enjoy the holiday! (I had it, it was a cold—the loss of smell/taste was by far the worst part, and persisted a while at some level)

A buddy of mine counsels young people testing positive (he's a psychiatrist running testing for the film industry here since last year) and in spite of daily testing, masking, eating outside, standing 2m apart, yada, yada, yada—they all catch COVID (as almost every single other human will). All are surprised—he says they all say something like, "But I did everything right!"—and he tells them to enjoy their hotel stay, enjoy free movies in the room, etc (studios put them up and pay for everything, a good deal).

Note that this was his advice even a year ago to them, when none were vaccinated. Now they all have 2-3 shots, and they still get COVID, and are still surprised every time.

Your film festival looks like it's off to a good start!
